
```{r}
# plot_si =
ggplot(data_si)+
  geom_area(
    aes(gen, N, fill = strat_social)
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "agent avoiding" = "indianred",
      "agent tracking" = "royalblue",
      "handler tracking" = "lightblue",
      "non-handler tracking" = "orange"
    )
  )+
  theme_test()+
  theme(
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(
      face = "italic"
    ),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.key.width = unit(5, units = "mm"),
    legend.key.height = unit(1, "mm")
  )+
  facet_grid(
    repl ~ spread,
    labeller = label_both
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    expand = F
  )+
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "# Agents",
    fill = NULL
  )

ggsave(
  plot_si,
  filename = "figures/fig_sc1_si_use.png",
  height = 6, width = 6
)
```
